snippet: Early results from the vote, which observers gave a mixed report, showed ZANU-PF, President Robert G. Mugabe’s party, earning a big majority in Parliament. There was no word yet on the presidential race.
abstract: Early election results in Zimbabwe show party of Pres Robert G Mugabe earning big majority in Parliament, allowing it to recapture parliamentary control from its main challenger.
lead_paragraph: Early results from the vote, which observers gave a mixed report, showed ZANU-PF, President Robert G. Mugabe’s party, earning a big majority in Parliament. There was no word yet on the presidential race.

headline.main: Mugabe’s Party Appears Headed for Parliamentary Victory in Zimbabwe
headline.print_headline: Mugabe’s Party Appears Headed for Parliamentary Victory in Zimbabwe
